model

Class MyModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MyModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    model.Model

    public class MyModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements model.Model

    MyModel class

    implements Model interface

    The model stores data that is retrieved according to commands from the controller and displayed in the view.

    Since:
    09-15-2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tal Oyar & Tomer Cohen
    See Also:
    Controller, View, Model, CommandManager

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exit()
      exit method terminate the program.
      void generateMaze(java.lang.String namemaze, int levels, int rows, int cols)
      generateMaze method generate a maze in a thread according to the dimensions received from the user and add it to an hashMap of mazes with the name entered by the user.
      int[][] getCrossSection(java.lang.String crossby, int index, java.lang.String name)
      getCrossSection method receives from the controller the name of the maze, the section(x,y,z) and the index and returns the 2dmaze
      java.io.File[] getDirectory(java.lang.String path)
      getDirectory method receives a directory path and returns a file array that contains all the folders and files in the directory.
      algorithms.mazeGenerators.Maze3d getMaze(java.lang.String name)
      getMaze method receives a string of the maze name and return the maze
      algorithms.search.Solution<algorithms.mazeGenerators.Position> getMazeSolution(java.lang.String name)
      getMazeSolution method returns the solution of the maze.
      void loadMaze(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String fileName)
      loadMaze method receives the name of the maze to load and the name of the file to load it from and loads the decompressed maze.
      void saveCompressMaze(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String fileName)
      saveCompressMaze method receives the name of the maze to be saved and the name of the file to save into and saves the compressed maze into that file
      void setController(controller.Controller controller)
      setController method sets the controller of the model
      void solveMaze3d(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String algorithm)
      solveMaze3d method receives the name of the maze to be solved and the desired algorithm(BFS or DFS) to solve it with. then solve the maze in a thread and adds the solution to an hashMap of solutions
